alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:29PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fremont County in southwestern Iowa... Nemaha County in southeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Otoe County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 829 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Brock, or 10 miles northwest of Auburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brock around 835 PM CDT. Auburn and Julian around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Peru and Brownville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
